mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VC_VIRTUAL_CENTER ( id, code, name, valid, createDate, lastUpdateDate, modifyAble, parentId, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{modifyAble}, #{parentId}, #{remark} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE VC_VIRTUAL_CENTER
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code}
